/* moim.makeMoim */ INSERT INTO TM_MOIMXM ( MOIM_IDXX /* 모임번호 */ , USER_NUMB /* 회원번호(방장번호) */ , MOIM_TITL /* 게더명 7자리 */ , MOIM_CNTT /* 상세내용 */ , CATE_IDXX /* 카테고리PK */ , FILE_SVNM /* 대표 이미지 파일 */ , REGI_CODE /* 행정구역코드 */ , APPR_YSNO /* 승인여부 (Y,N) */ , APPR_GNDR /* 참가성별(NULL,M,W) */ , MINN_AGEE /* 최소참가연령(제한없음0) */ , MAXX_AGEE /* 최대참가연령(제한없음100) */ , MINN_PEOP /* 최소참가인원(2) */ , MAXX_PEOP /* 최대참가인원(30) */ , MOIM_COST /* 참가비용 */ , MOIM_DATE /* 모임날짜(마감날짜) */ , MOIM_TIME /* 모임시간(마감시간) */ , REGG_DATE /* 등록날짜 */ , COMP_YSNO /* 작성완료여부 */ , DELT_YSNO /* 삭제여부(Y,N) */ , ENDD_YSNO /* 마감여부 */ ) VALUES ( #{MOIM_IDXX} /* 게더번호 */ , #{USER_NUMB} /* 회원번호(방장번호) */ , #{MOIM_TITL, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 게더명 */ , #{MOIM_CNTT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세내용 */ , #{CATE_IDXX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 카테고리PK */ , #{FILE_SVNM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 대표 이미지 파일 */ , #{REGI_CODE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 행정구역코드 */ , #{APPR_YSNO, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 승인여부 (Y,N) */ , #{APPR_GNDR, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 참가성별(NULL,M,W) */ , #{MINN_AGEE, jdbcType=INTEGER} /* 최소참가연령(제한없음0) */ , #{MAXX_AGEE, jdbcType=INTEGER} /* 최대참가연령(제한없음100) */ , #{MINN_PEOP, jdbcType=INTEGER} /* 최소참가인원(2) */ , #{MAXX_PEOP, jdbcType=INTEGER} /* 최대참가인원(30) */ , #{MOIM_COST, jdbcType=INTEGER} /* 참가비용 */ , #{MOIM_DATE, jdbcType=DATE} /* 모임날짜(마감날짜) */ , #{MOIM_TIME, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 모임시간(마감시간) */ , SYSDATE /* 등록날짜 */ , #{COMP_YSNO} /* 작성완료여부 */ , 'N' /* 삭제여부(Y,N) */ , 'N' /* 마감여부 */ )
mapper.select:
SELECT /*mainPage.mainGather*/ RNUM , TYPE /* 게더 타입 ('Taste': 취항 , 'Hot': 핫한게더 , 'Like':좋아요 많은 순 'Region': 지역) */ , MOIM_IDXX /* 게더 ID */ , MOIM_TITL /* 게더 제목 */ , MOIM_IMAG /* 게더 대표이미지 */ , CATE_IDXX /* 카테고리 코드 */ , PARENTS_CATE /* 상위 카테고리 */ , CHILD_CATE /* 하위 카테고리 */ , PRES_PEOP /* 현재 인원: (현재인원/최대인원)*/ , APPR_YSNO /* 승인여부 */ , APPR_LMIT /* 모임 제한 */ , PREGI_NAME /* 부모지역명 */ , REGI_NAME /* 지역명 */ , USER_NUMB /* 방장 회원번호 */ , USER_NICK /* 방장 닉네임 */ , USER_IMAG /* 방장 프로필사진 */ , SMAL_DATE /* 모임시간 (날짜 형식 MM.dd(day) 오전/오후 HH:mm) */ , FULL_DATE /* 날짜 형식 (YYYY년 M월 오전/오후 HH:mm) */ , LIKE_COUNT /* 좋아요 수 */ , REGG_DATE /* 개설일 */ , ENDD_YSNO /* 모임 시간*/ , getAmILike(MOIM_IDXX, #{USER_NUMB, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS LIKE_YSNO /* 로그인유저 좋아요 유무 */ , getAmIBkmk(MOIM_IDXX, #{USER_NUMB, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS BKMK_YSNO /* 로그인유저 북마크 유무 */ FROM (
(
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGG_DATE DESC) RNUM , 'Taste' AS TYPE , MOIM_IDXX , MOIM_TITL , MOIM_IMAG , CATE_IDXX , PARENTS_CATE , CHILD_CATE , PRES_PEOP , APPR_YSNO , APPR_LMIT , PREGI_NAME , REGI_NAME , USER_NUMB , USER_NICK , USER_IMAG , SMAL_DATE , FULL_DATE , LIKE_COUNT , REGG_DATE , ENDD_YSNO FROM VW_MOIMXM WHERE CATE_IDXX IN ( SELECT CATE_IDXX FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGG_DATE DESC) RNUM , CATE_IDXX FROM TB_URCATE WHERE USER_NUMB = #{USER_NUMB}) WHERE RNUM <= 3 ) ) UNION ALL
( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGG_DATE DESC) RNUM ,'Hot' AS TYPE , MOIM_IDXX , MOIM_TITL , MOIM_IMAG , CATE_IDXX , PARENTS_CATE , CHILD_CATE , PRES_PEOP , APPR_YSNO , APPR_LMIT , PREGI_NAME , REGI_NAME , USER_NUMB , USER_NICK , USER_IMAG , SMAL_DATE , FULL_DATE , LIKE_COUNT , REGG_DATE , ENDD_YSNO FROM VW_MOIMXM WHERE (MEMB_COUNT/MAXX_PEOP)*100 > 70 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , 'Like' AS TYPE , MOIM_IDXX , MOIM_TITL , MOIM_IMAG , CATE_IDXX , PARENTS_CATE , CHILD_CATE , PRES_PEOP , APPR_YSNO , APPR_LMIT , PREGI_NAME , REGI_NAME , USER_NUMB , USER_NICK , USER_IMAG , SMAL_DATE , FULL_DATE , LIKE_COUNT , REGG_DATE , ENDD_YSNO FROM ( SELECT MOIM_IDXX , MOIM_TITL , MOIM_IMAG , CATE_IDXX , PARENTS_CATE , CHILD_CATE , PRES_PEOP , APPR_YSNO , APPR_LMIT , PREGI_NAME , REGI_NAME , USER_NUMB , USER_NICK , USER_IMAG , SMAL_DATE , FULL_DATE , LIKE_COUNT , REGG_DATE , ENDD_YSNO FROM VW_MOIMXM ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) )
UNION ALL ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGG_DATE DESC) RNUM , 'Region' AS TYPE , MOIM_IDXX , MOIM_TITL , MOIM_IMAG , CATE_IDXX , PARENTS_CATE , CHILD_CATE , PRES_PEOP , APPR_YSNO , APPR_LMIT , PREGI_NAME , REGI_NAME , USER_NUMB , USER_NICK , USER_IMAG , SMAL_DATE , FULL_DATE , LIKE_COUNT , REGG_DATE , ENDD_YSNO FROM VW_MOIMXM WHERE REGI_CODE IN ( SELECT REGI_CODE FROM TB_URREGI WHERE USER_NUMB = #{USER_NUMB} ) )
) WHERE RNUM <= 12 AND ENDD_YSNO = 'N'

SELECT /*moim.getMoimCount*/ COUNT(*) AS MOIM_COUNT FROM VW_MOIMXM WHERE 1=1
AND CATE_IDXX LIKE '%'||#{CATE_IDXX}||'%'
AND (REGI_NAME LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR (PREGI_NAME LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR (CHILD_CATE LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR (PARENTS_CATE LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR (MOIM_TITL LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR (MOIM_CNTT LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR (USER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%') OR MOIM_IDXX IN (SELECT HASH_IDXX FROM TB_HASHTG WHERE HASH_TAGG LIKE '%'||#{KEYY_WORD}||'%')

SELECT /*moim.getMoimImg*/ MOIM_IMAG
FROM ( SELECT MOIM_IMAG , '000' AS FILE_SEQC FROM VW_GATHER WHERE MOIM_IDXX = #{MOIM_IDXX}
UNION
SELECT FILE_PATH AS MOIM_IMAG , FILE_SEQC AS FILE_SEQC FROM TM_FILEXM A LEFT JOIN VW_GATHER B ON A.FILE_IDXX = B.MOIM_IDXX WHERE FILE_IDXX = #{MOIM_IDXX} AND A.FILE_PATH <> B.MOIM_IMAG AND DELT_YSNO = 'N' ) A ORDER BY FILE_SEQC
